channel.title: How would I add fletching to a ((317))
channel.description: I was wondering if adding fletching would be difficult? If not can someone tell me how I would go about doing so?

item.title: How would I add fletching to a ((317))

Are you serious? :s

I suggest you take off your signature because you’re just as worse lol

item.source: How would I add fletching to a ((317))

item.title: How would I add fletching to a ((317))
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“pure ess ftw, post:4, topic:272888”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=360197.msg2744875#msg2744875 date=1239567249]

this would be VERY simple, just using codes, then making it add exp o.o code would look somewhat like this!(for arrows)

if(((itemUsed == arrow_head_ID) && (otherItem == Arrow_shaft_ID))){
deleteItem(Arrow_head_ID, getItemSlot(Arrow_head_ID), 15);
deleteItem(Arrow_shaft_ID, getItemSlot(Arrow_shaft_ID), 15);
addItem(arrow_code_here, 15);
addSkillXP(Amount_of_exp, Flecting_skill_number); 
sM("You have made 15 Arrow_type_here arrow!.");

PM me if it dont work o.o it would be added into client.java

God use conventions…

Go to packet 53 and start from there. You’ll see how the packet works by seeing other codes.
[/quote]
what packet 53 are you talking about???[/quote]

Are you serious? :s

I suggest you take off your signature because you’re just as worse lol

Read full topic
